name: PhiBrows Black SUPE Pigment 5ml - 2pcs
short_description: Â is one of three basic pigments used to get brown shades for eyebrow drawing. Black pigment is used to get darker tones if it is dominant in the mixture with yellow and red.
long_description: - When mixed with yellow (2 Yellow: 1 Black), we get Olive shade. Olive is added to the intended pigment when we are working over old reddish microblading. Warning! Using pure Black pigment for eyebrow drawing may result in grey colour after healing.contains 2 pieces of 5ml pigment
